name: Elven Blade (1h)
data: It has poor weapon class for its type (little in general).
It decreases the users dexterity pitifully.
It decreases the users constitution pitifully.
It increases the users intelligence a tiny bit.
It decreases the users armour class pathetically.
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration nicely.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives decent bonus to the spell 'psychic crush'.
It modifies the wielder's mana regeneration.
